update mms_mt_message_submit set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attach = #{attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passage_id = #{passageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, need_push = #{needPush,jdbcType=BIT}, push_url = #{pushUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_unixtime = #{createUnixtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, destnation_no = #{destnationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_id = #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select s.*,p.name passage_name from mms_mt_message_submit s,mms_passage p where s.passage_id = p.id and s.sid = #{sid} order by id desc
select id,user_id,sid,msg_id,mobile,passage_id, create_time, need_push, push_url,attach,destnation_no from mms_mt_message_submit where msg_id = #{msgId} order by id desc limit 1
select id,user_id,sid,msg_id,mobile,passage_id, create_time, need_push, push_url,attach,destnation_no from mms_mt_message_submit where mobile = #{mobile} order by id desc limit 1

select id,user_id,sid,msg_id,mobile,passage_id, create_time, need_push, push_url,attach,destnation_no from mms_mt_message_submit where msg_id = #{msgId} and mobile = #{mobile} order by id desc limit 1

select id,user_id,sid,msg_id,mobile,passage_id, create_time, need_push, push_url,attach,destnation_no from mms_mt_message_submit where passage_id = #{passageId} and msg_id = #{msgId} and mobile = #{mobile} order by id desc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert ignore into mms_mt_message_submit (user_id, sid, mobile, province_code, cmcp, template_id, title, content, attach, passage_id, need_push, push_url, create_time, create_unixtime, destnation_no, status, remark, msg_id) values
(#{message.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{message.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.passageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.needPush,jdbcType=BIT}, #{message.pushUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{message.createUnixtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{message.destnationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message.msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id,sum(fee) fee, count(*) amount from mms_mt_message_submit where create_time = #{date} group by user_id

select ss.*,sd.id deliver_id,sd.status deliver_status from mms_mt_message_submit ss left join mms_mt_message_deliver sd on ss.msg_id = sd.msg_id and ss.mobile = sd.mobile where ss.passage_id = #{passageId} and ss.create_unixtime >= #{startTime} and ss.create_unixtime <= #{endTime} order by sd.id desc

SELECT s.user_id, s.province_code, s.passage_id, count(*) as submit_count, sum(s.fee) as bill_count, sum(CASE sd.status WHEN 0 THEN fee ELSE 0 END) AS success_count, sum(CASE WHEN sd.status IS NOT NULL AND sd.status!=0 THEN fee ELSE 0 END) AS submit_failed_count, sum(CASE WHEN sd.status IS NULL THEN fee ELSE 0 END) AS unknown_count FROM mms_mt_message_submit s LEFT JOIN mms_mt_message_deliver sd ON sd.msg_id = s.msg_id AND sd.mobile = s.mobile WHERE s.create_unixtime >= #{startTime} and s.create_unixtime <= #{endTime} GROUP BY s.user_id, s.province_code, s.passage_id

SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.content, s.create_time, s.status as send_status, sd.status as deliver_status, sd.create_time as deliver_time, sd.status_code FROM mms_mt_message_submit s LEFT JOIN mms_mt_message_deliver sd ON sd.msg_id = s.msg_id AND sd.mobile = s.mobile WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} and s.mobile = #{mobile}
SELECT COUNT(*) as count, province_code, cmcp FROM mms_mt_message_submit WHERE create_unixtime >= #{startTime} and create_unixtime <= #{endTime} GROUP BY province_code, cmcp
